definition: worm-like invertebrate/mythical animal (see 獬豸[xie4 zhi4])/radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 153)
spoon/ladle/CL:把[ba3]/abbr. for 公勺[gong1 shao2], centiliter (unit of volume)
lit. to see a leopard through a narrow tube (idiom); fig. to miss the big picture
the full picture (i.e. the whole situation)/panorama
Xi Menbao (active around 422 BC), statesman, general and hydraulic engineer of Wei state 魏國|魏国[Wei4 guo2]
jackals, wolves, tigers and panthers (idiom)/animals who are dangerous to man and cattle/fierce and cruel people
lit. see one spot on a leopard (idiom); fig. a restricted view
Yu Wenbao (lived around 1240), prolific Song dynasty poet
to eat bear heart and leopard gall (idiom)/to pluck up some courage
pinyin: chi1 xiong2 xin1 bao4 zi5 dan3

definition: Phocidae, family within Carnivora including seal

sentences.english: He's part of that Pink Panther group that held up a jewelry store in Paris.
sentences.chinese: 他是在巴黎開珠寶店的粉紅豹不可分割的一部分。

sentences.english: My father-in-law has ear hair like a wolverine.
sentences.chinese: 我的岳父頭上留着一些像狼豹那樣的耳毛。

sentences.english: Where does Heze have selling the naughty pink leopard?
sentences.chinese: 菏澤哪裏有賣粉紅頑皮豹？

sentences.english: The population dynamics of Pardosa T-insignita in cotton fields were analysed.
sentences.chinese: 分析了丁紋豹蛛種羣消長動態。

sentences.english: One day, we had an argument about the hunting habits of lions and cougars .
sentences.chinese: 有一天，我們倆爲獅子和豹的覓食習性爭論起來。

sentences.english: Both the leopard and the goat were given to him on leashes .
sentences.chinese: 兩個被皮帶拴住的豹及山羊交到了他的手上。

sentences.english: Twice he had seen leopards pouncing on unsuspecting young baboons.
sentences.chinese: 他兩次目睹羣豹向毫無戒備的小狒狒猛撲過去。

sentences.english: The most famous dish, Dragon and Tiger Fight, is a dish of braised snake and leopard.
sentences.chinese: 粵菜裏最有名是“龍虎鬥”，也就是燉蛇肉和豹肉。

sentences.english: As a large group they can attack even gaur, leopard and even tiger.
sentences.chinese: 大羣的豺甚至可以攻擊野牛，豹甚至老虎。

sentences.english: The distribution of forelimb arteries in a leopard was observed by perfusion.
sentences.chinese: 通過動脈灌注解剖觀察了豹的前肢動脈分佈。

sentences.english: The Amur leopard is one of the most endangered animals in the world.
sentences.chinese: 阿穆爾豹是世界上最瀕危的幾種動物之一。

sentences.english: Get ready to be tickled pink by The Pink Panther .
sentences.chinese: 準備好讓《粉紅豹》帶您樂翻天吧。

sentences.english: On this fast-flowing source of life for many animals lives the Amur leopard.
sentences.chinese: 遠東豹就住在這個多數動物賴以維生的急流之地。

sentences.english: Besides being ugly, the Oyster toadfish has the distinction of having one of its own go into space.
sentences.chinese: 除了相貌醜陋之外，毒棘豹蟾魚曾經還進入過太空。
